settings.title: DISCOVER A NEW WAY OF LIFE!
Feel Better. Sleep Better. Recover Faster.
Feel better
settings.text: Our CBD oils made with simple ingredients. Nutrient-dense MCT oil meets outdoor grown hemp for premium THC Free Broad Spectrum and Full Spectrum CBD tincture in up to 3000MG.

settings.title: Recover Faster
settings.text: When aches or discomfort creep in, just try our CBD pain relief rubs.

settings.title: Self-Care with CBD
settings.text: Our newest CBD product line of high potency CBD oils, CBD Gummies, Capsules, and Rubs. A perfect choice for your Self-Care routine that will transforms you from the inside, out!

settings.testimonial: I ordered the citrus flavor drops and I really like them. The flavor is fresh and mild. I tried the lowest dose CBD oil on my first purchase, and this is much better. The stronger oil makes all the difference
settings.name: Frank T

settings.testimonial: I recently had a car accident and my therapist suggested a TENS device. I immediately went looking for one, skeptical at first to purchase plus I needed to do some research on CBD. This is a great product. I have used it on aching joints, muscles and dry skin. It has quickly relieved the pain in my elbows, ankles and knees and does a fantastic job at moisturizing my skin.
settings.name: Joana T

settings.testimonial: Having tried any number of competing brands, I have been delighted with Eskimo Natural’s gummies: they're effective, reasonably priced, and well sourced. I take a gummy at night before bed and enjoy a relaxing venture with the Sandman. Couldn't be happier.
settings.name: Henry S

settings.title: Free Nurse Consultation
settings.text:
Free 30 minutes with a Certified Cannabis Nurse to help you understand CBD dosing and medication review.

________________________________________________________________

Made with the highest quality ingredients 100% organically grown USA hemp and is non-GMO Vegan-friendly, gluten-free, and has NO metals, harsh chemicals, or pesticides.

FarmBill Compliant

Our CBD is 2018 Farm Bill compliant and 100% legal in all 50 states. We ship nationwide. Heads up! Our premium CBD is coming in hot!

 3rd PartyLab Tested

All of our products go through a rigorous third-party testing process. We make sure the hemp is free of contaminants. Then we analyze the CBD and other raw ingredients for content and purity. And finally, test every batch for quality assurance.

Made In The USA

From sea to shining sea, we source our hemp from various farms to find the best hemp and we manufacture our CBD in the USA. It doesn’t get much more local than that!

settings.image_blog_subtitle: This is a subheading for your blog page

settings.title: NEW CBD CAPSULES 2400mg (60ct)
settings.text:
*Fast and easy way to get a daily dose of CBD.

*The capsules are made from raw, full-spectrum hemp plants with less than 0.3% THC.

*Available in 40mg high potency dosages.

*Sweet taste, easy to swallow.

*You don't have to deal with the taste or feel of oil if you don’t like it.

*Get your dose of CBD just by popping a capsule, no muss, no fuss.
